resources.string: Invalid check digit: %1$s, expected check digit is: %2$s
Country code is required; it cannot be zero
IBAN country code must contain two upper case letters
Country code: %1$s is not supported
IBAN contains non-existing country code
Length is %1$s, expected length is: %2$s
IBAN length can\'t be less than %1$s
Invalid Character[%1$s] = \'%2$s\'
Zero can\'t be a valid IBAN
%1$s must only contain upper case letters
%1$s must only contain digits and letters
%1$s must only contain digits
Position 3 and 4 must be digits
Only upper case at position %1$s
Only digits at this position %1$s
Only letters and digits at this position %1$s
Maximum Length Exceeded
Bank code is required; it cannot be zero
Account number is required; it cannot be zero
BIC country code must contain upper case letters
BIC contains non-existing country code: %1$s
Zero can\'t be a valid BIC
BIC length must be %1$s or %2$s
BIC must only contain upper case letters
Bank code must only contain letters
Location code must only contain letters or digits
Branch code must only contain letters or digits
